title: 服务端循环崩溃 不能启动
author: guige1122
txt_content:
本帖最后由 guige1122 于 2014-4-15 13:26 编辑 

15.04 13:19:26 [Multicraft] Server stopped
15.04 13:19:26 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
15.04 13:19:26 [Multicraft] Server shut down
15.04 13:19:26 [Server] INFO Could not reserve enough space for object heap
15.04 13:19:26 [Server] INFO Error occurred during initialization of VM
15.04 13:19:26 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "MCPC+1.6.4（有MOD有插件）"
出现以上日志
无法解决

replies.txt_content: multicraft问题 删除这mod/plugin即可 最近看他们经常碰到
